item.title: ViVeLab - Virtual Verification Technology - ViVeTech
item.description:
ViVeLab - Virtual Verification Technology - ViVeTech

ViVeLab is a complex online ergonomy system to do virtual testing and verification of product plans and simulate interactions between the human and machines or even with the environment. With this simulation tool you can model and analyze the effects and the mechanisms of almost any complex systems or products real time and in cost-effective manner.

item.title: Web Animations In Interaction Design: 2016 And Beyond
item.description:
Web Animations In Interaction Design: 2016 And Beyond

We'll explain web animation's 5 most effective uses, as well as what to expect the near future. But in order to understand where animation is at now and where it's going, you must first know where it came from.

item.title: ViVeMachine - Virtual Verification Technology - ViVeTech
item.description:
ViVeMachine - Virtual Verification Technology - ViVeTech

ViVeMachine is an engineering toolbar of ViVeLab platform. ViVeMachine makes the simulation, test and analysis of mechanical system controlled by the human possible.

item.title: Technical features of CharAT - Virtual Verification Technology - VHE GmbH
item.description:
Technical features of CharAT - Virtual Verification Technology - VHE GmbH

CHARAT SKELETON MODEL CharAT Ergonomics Skeleton Models consist of 110 bone elements. The absolute flexibility of the kinematic structure enables free adjustments throughout the design process to reach the analysis objectives. The analysis organization will be immediately realized in a database management system. All the CharAT Ergonomics Services are integrated in it.

item.title: 5 data analytics trends to watch in 2016
item.description:
5 data analytics trends to watch in 2016

Although the big data market will exceed $50B in 2016 according to analysts, what's most exciting is that the disruptive power of machine data analytics is only in its infancy. Machine analytics will be the fastest growing area of big data, which will have CAGR greater than 1000%.

item.title: DoSell | BETTER COMPANY FASTER - Services
item.description:
DoSell | BETTER COMPANY FASTER - Services

With DoSell managers and SME leaders are able to keep their fingers on their company's gowth and efficiency at all times, thereby reducing costs by as much as 50%, maintaining greater control over expenditures, increasing their market access globally by 10x times at any given time, and avoiding making decisions that could cost them thousands if not millions of dollars - all in just a few clicks.
